input: why some things sometimes are working well, but then just stop
response: It can be really confusing and frustrating when things that were once working just stop for no clear reason. Sometimes this happens because of changes we can't see right away, like when a toy has run out of batteries or when a plan doesn't go as expected because something outside our control changed. Other times, it can be because we're feeling differently inside or because we need to try a different way of doing things. It's okay to feel upset when things stop working, and it's also a chance to learn and adjust. Would you like to talk about something specific that's not working well right now?
